GSD.description:
ASoC: SOF: Intel: hda-dai: fix possible stream_tag leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.232 by commit 5660a6ffa7a4a5ace9c10274a208ec011592f6d6. For more details please see the references link.
